data.description: Beautiful 4 bedrooms plus loft area! Great open floorplan with large family room and formal dining room! Large kitchen with 42"" cabinets, ceramic tile, breakfast niche overlooking patio. Huge owners suite with walk-in closet and deluxe master bath and large secondary bedrooms. A must see!
